desc: Full Circle Beans offers delicious coffee beans straight from the grower in Central America. Every bag of coffee beans sold will go to buy a Bible which is returned straight back to the region where the beans were grown! Full Circle!

layout.text: Our mission is to provide Bibles and Christian Literature to Countries in need. Every bag purchased buys a Bible to be given away in the very same country where the coffee was grown. Bringing it Full Circle!
